name: tradingview-syariah-indicator
description: Display small shariah indicator to stock list in tradingview(MY)

scripts.build: web-ext build --overwrite-dest --ignore-files update-data docs *.md package.json package-lock.json stock-list.json stock-readonly-list.json _config.yml
